newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: RESEARCH ALERT - Sivensa rated buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Sivensa rated buy.

text.p: Salomon Brothers rated Venezuelan steel company Sivensa as a buy.

-- Based on its attractive valuation compared to its peer group, Salomon analyst Cristina von Bargen recommended that investors take advantage of the stock's current price weakness. At 10:45 local/ 14:45 GMT the stock stood at 340.00 bolivars, twelve bolivars up from the opening price.

-- a strong export to domestic sales ration offers a good hedge to upset domestic market upheavals, although Venezuelan economic recovery in 1997 should see domestic sales rise ten to 15 percent, the report said.
